name: reserve_entity_by_id
description: Causes the <%= type 'Tile' %> to become _reserved_ by a <%= type 'Entity' %> with a specific **unique ID**.
An <%= type 'Entity' %> reserving a <%= type 'Tile' %> will stop it from being set to certain <%= type 'TileState' %>s.

parameters.name: entity_id
parameters.desc: The **unique ID** of the <%= type 'Entity' %> that you want to mark as reserving this <%= type 'Tile' %>.
